p: ZIKV may be associated with particular phenotypic presentations of GBS. ZIKV-associated GBS has been associated with more dysautonomia, facial nerve palsy, and a more rapid onset of clinical GBS signs [ 27, 28]. Although our numbers are small, we found that dyspnea was more common in symptomatic ZIKV GBS case-patients, and symptomatic ZIKV infection was associated with more frequent need for mechanical ventilation.
